description:
WHO ELSE WANTS SMARTER KIDS?

If your child is not doing well at school, poor vocabulary could be the problem.

Smart Kids have superior vocabularies.

Raising smart children just got easier

If you have ever imagined having a wildly successful child (one with the potential to become president), then you must boost your child's vocabulary.

You must start immediately, working diligently on your child's vocabulary.

We're making it easy for you by removing all the hard work usually associated with helping a child succeed at school.

The time consuming tasks of doing research on the Internet, looking for worksheets and trying to figure out answers have been done for you.

You will find everything you need right here.

Use the course materials to rapidly improve your child's vocabulary

Your ward can learn as many as 10 words a day.

This course teaches together, 10 at a time, words that form plurals similarly. It also introduces 10 plural nouns i.e. nouns used only in the plural form and that do not have a singular form.

We have introduced video flash cards and quizzes in this volume of the Smarter Kids in a Year series. This is yet another way to help your kid master the plurals quickly and easily.

But there is more…

Because you the parent need to be satisfied that learning is taking place, there are quizzes for you to check your child's progress. Use these quizzes to decide if your child needs to spend more time on the material before moving on.

…and more

We go one step further and provide a posttest app that randomly generates 20 questions related to the 50 plurals taught.

The app can be downloaded to an iPad or Android and used anytime, anywhere without an Internet connection.

The test will be different each time you take it so it can be used multiple times now and in the future as revision to keep your protégé sharp.

How this course is organized

You will know exactly what your child is learning because one of the first lectures is a Parent's Reference Guide listing all the plurals that make up this course.

The sections for you also include details on how to access additional materials that you can use, to catapult your ward to the head of the pack, including the free posttest app that you will use to be sure that your son or daughter is ready to move on to the next 50 words.

The remaining sections, the teaching sections, contain the meat of the course. This is where the 50 plurals are taught 10 at a time.

With your encouragement your child would be on the way to a better command of the English language and better grades in school.

You have nothing to lose as there is a 30 day money back guarantee. And you keep the posttest app.

Every minute you delay may be causing your child to get left behind at school.

Go ahead and enrol now. Click the "Take This Course" button.

Your child's future is determined by your present actions.

Dova Team

P.S. You can also use this course to teach yourself vocabulary and improve your life. Research shows that people with a command of their spoken language are the ones holding key positions in their organizations.
title: Vocabulary Learning: Smarter Kids in a Year - Plurals 1
